DoDHCP

Empty

# Issue an ARP request in order to generate BOOTP/DHCP requests.
Packet
82ab cdef 0009 ac22  0b4f fa85 0806 0001
0800 0604 0001 ac22  0b4f fa85 ac10 0661
0000 0000 0000 ac10  0606 0000 0000 0000
0000 0000 0000 0000  0000 0000 32ab a734

# DHCP offer (wrong transaction ID)
Packet

0148 0000 0000 8011  b3d6 c0a8 0201 c0a8
026d 0043 0044 0134  2587 0201 0600 0321
5507 0000 0000 0000  0000 c0a8 026d 0000

# DHCP ack, Wrong IP (compared to offer), should not be accepted
Packet

0148 0000 0000 8011  b3d6 c0a8 0201 c0a8
026d 0043 0044 0134  2777 0201 0600 fe38
5507 0000 0000 0000  0000 c0a0 026d 0000

Sleep

# Second (duplicate) offer.  Should not be accepted
# (i.e. not cause a second request to be generated).
Packet
FinPacket
fcaa 1426 9ab7 fcec  da7a 0173 0800 4510
0148 0000 0000 8011  b3d6 c0a8 0201 c0a8
026d 0043 0044 0134  2a6f 0201 0600 fe38
5507 0000 0000 0000  0000 c0a8 026d 0000
0000 0000 0000 fcaa  1426 9ab7 0000 0000
